dt-option.name: rowGroup.emptyDataGroup
dt-option.summary: Text to show for rows which have `null` or `undefined` group data

type.description: The text that will be shown in the grouping row for the data.

dt-option.description: If the data point (`-init rowGroup.dataSrc`) for a row is either `null` or `undefined`, it will still create a group of similar data, but the label shown is defined by this option.
